368b3('dul ba): ma'i thugam pa / wA sa na pa sa // thas nas ldan lal / ldan parnams// bden pa tsha ni ga zhes// mam
368b4('dul ba): nyes parnams cad 'phrog byed ga/ snyun rlab ci gyung ba shog/ sangs chos nam gzigs kAn+te dang// gtsug tor na gyis pas rnams da/ 
368b5('dul ba): cad slob kyi bden cig dang // log dang sel gyi ting 'dzin dang // gser zhes bya ba'i ye shes dang // 'od srung gi ni rdzu 'phrul dang // shAkya seng ge'i mthu rnams kyis// sman rnam
368b6('dul ba): // sas rgyas su bye sa// pa rgyal dag gig yis// dgrab cas rnams kyis ga //  byin ma
369a1('dul ba): dga' bo'i thos pa dang // tshangs pa yi ni byams pa dang // tsargya byin gyis ni la rnams dang // 'jig rten sno shi su po rnams dang // dbang phyug char po'i stos pa/ 
369a2('dul ba): sre dpon rnams kyi me dag dang // grogs gce yi rgyu phrul dang // de dag rnams kyi mthu nga gau cigag/ bdag gi drag ni drug med shog/ 'phags pa
369a3('dul ba): chen mo rab tu 'joms pa las gsungs pa'i smon lam/ rdzogs so// // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba rab gzigs su ngar
369a4('dul ba): tshang la gnas// rgyal ba gtsug tar pad ma dkar po'i drung // thams cad skyob pas la'i drung na gnas// bram ze 'khor ba 'jig ni shing shi'i drung // sangs rgyas
369a5('dul ba): jam pa // 'das c-ig na'i rgyun gnas// zhes sa mchog kyang bar gnas // sbyi nas byang chub sa gyur ga~M tas// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul chen po
369a6('dul ba): mngon par dad pa'i lha gang 'khod pa dag/ lha rnams de dag yid dga' mgur gyur nas// rtag tu dag zhing zhi bar byos// / sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal
369a7('dul ba): nga gnyis byed rnams bde lags so// nang bani khyed cag pa legs nag/ lam du zhugs rnams pa de legs shig// bye dag kyang nga legs na/ 
369b1('dul ba): bar legs nyin bde legs// nyi ma'i phung la bde legs shing // byed cag kun du bde leb pa thog/ de dag rtsig par ma gyur cig/ nyi ma thams cad dge ba yin// rgya skar thams
369b2('dul ba): cad bzang po yin// sangs rgyas thams cad rdzu 'phrul cha/ dgra bcom thams cad bad pa med// bden pa'i tshig gis kun tu bde legs su gyur cig/ rigs sngags kyi rgyal
369b3('dul ba): bya chen mo las gsungs pa'i smon lam dang bden tshigasardzogs so// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// gang la ser sna rnam chags pa// rnam 'joms dri
369b4('dul ba): ma med mdzad pa// thugs ni gnod pa mi mnga' das// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyung// 'dren pa gang zhig 'gro ba rnams// thar pa'i lam du 'ju mdzad cing // cho
369b5('dul ba): rnams thams cad ston pa des// khyed la bde leg pa mdzad par 'gyur// ston pa 'gro ba rnams kyi ten// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// gang zhes bde ba mnga' mdzad des/ 
369b6('dul ba): byed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// skyob pa gang zhig byams pa yi// thugs kyis 'gro ba 'di dag kun// bu gcig bzhin du rtag bsrungs des// khyed la bde legs mdza
369b7('dul ba): gang zhig 'khor bar 'khor ba yi// sems can kun gyi rten gyur cig/ gling dang dpung gnyen gyur pa des// khyed lasade legs mdzad par 'gyur// gang
369b8('dul ba): rig chos kun mngon sum gyur// gtsab zhing slub mi mnga' ga/ gsung gtsang gtsang bar mdzad pa des// khyed la bde leg pa mdzad par 'gyur// dpa' bo chen po gang skyes
370a1('dul ba): la phun sum tshogs don 'byor gyur cing // don grub chags kyang grub pa des// khyed la bde lags mdzad par 'gyur// gang nig skyes pasas rnams dpa
370a2('dul ba): nags tshal bcas pa ba g.yos nas// sems can thams cad rab dag 'des// byed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// byang chub snying po gang nig gis// sa rnams
370a3('dul ba): drug g.yos gyur cing // bdud yid mi bder gyur pa des// khyed la bde legal mang bar 'gyur// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ma// 'phags pa'i bden pa gsungs pagab
370a4('dul ba): thub pi'i grags pa 'byung ba des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// yid 'phrog grang gis mu stegs byed// thams cad chos kyi sa 'am mdzad cing // chog
370a5('dul ba): dbang du mdzad pa des// khyed la bde lags mdzad par 'gyur// sangs rgyas khyod la bde legs mdzad// brgya byin lhar bcas bde legs dag/ 'byung po kun gyi bde lem
370a6('dul ba): khyed lnga dus kun sbyin kyar cig/ sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu drug dang // lha rnams kyis ni bsams pa yis// khyed kyi don 'dod gling phyir pa/

371a1('dul ba): d+ha rmad byung dpag med de// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ran chen 'jig rten mchog/ ji ltar nga' de de bzhin bden mchogs// 'don pa 'dis de ni tu 'ang
371a2('dul ba): so// zhi 'gog bdud rtse shin du gya nom gang // shAkya thub pas mnyam bzhag zugs chung ba// tshwas dang ni mtshungs pa yod min te// da mngon bya sa na phyir cang byar dped/

371a5('dul ba): ngomatshar shin tu rmad kyang dpag med// dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchag/ rnga ltar nga'i 'ad bzhin bdan mchog na// bden pa 'dis ni shin tu ba de lags shos
371a6('dul ba): dam pa gtso bo mchog sbyin ga nom pa// 'ong mchog dpa' bo dam pa mchog gi gnas// shes rab dam pa mchog ga dbab mchog/ mchog min mchog mkhyen 'di ni bco

371b2('dul ba): ba 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog/ je lta nogatan dam zhing rab dam ste// stobs chen rlung bzhi dag gis mi bskyang ba// da ltar mkhas pa bden pa ni mthor gnas pa/

373b4('dul ba): 'drag pa ltar// lag pa g.yas na dpal yong shoka/ g.yon na'ang dpal ni gnas gyur cig/ yang lag kun la'ang dpal yod shog/ cheng bdag ni nor tshol zhing // phyogs dran
373b5('dul ba): rag tu 'gro ba rnams// rnyed pa chen po rnyed gyur cing // de dag bde ba skyid par shog/ dgos pa la la gang gi phyir// shar phyogs su ni dkro ba na// gang dag phyogs der gnas par/

374a1('dul ba): dbang po zhes bya stobs poche// de rnams khye la ma pa// shis par ldag par myong byung cig/ shar phyogs logs kyi phyogs char// lha mo ga na/

374a3('dul ba): ra cing // shis par lhag par skyong bar shog/ shar phyogs logs kyi phyogs chan// gzhi 'dzin ces bya'i mchod rten yod// rgyal ba skyo' ba dgra bcom pa// de rnams

375a1('dul ba): gcig zad par yang // dbang po zhes bya stobs par // de dag khyod la dad ma cang // shes par skrag par rgya // nub phyogs lags
375a2('dul ba): tshwar// phra mo gzhon nu brgyad yod de// rna cha sgra 'dres mya dang ni// pad ma dkar dang skya reng dang // cha med gcig dang dku ba dang // rol dang gnag dang stobs byang srid// de sa
